main event: A civilian observed a glowing reddish-orange object in the sky while driving home from work in Temple City, California, on November 13, 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 30 to 35 minutes,The witness noted that the object was hovering and moved from side to side and up and down,The sighting occurred around 8:00 P.M.,The witness's son was with him and also saw the object,The Air Force received a letter from the witness requesting further investigation.
sighted object: one glowing reddish-orange object in the sky
